thread.section_title: Hotel Parisiana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Campaign HQ
thread.title_full: Campaign HQ - Review of Hotel Parisiana, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mikegreenow
title: Campaign HQ
text: We are a group of mainly superannuated men who love rugby, eating and drinking, joking and yarning. We come to Paris often and have consistently chosen this hotel for well over twenty years. For us the location, so near the Gare du Nord, is excellent but its greatest strength is its friendly but efficient staff, pleasantly accommodating in every sense. We go out on the town knowing that all is well behind us and will be when we return.
